localResource.name: Period_Dates
localResource.label: Period Dates
localResource.queryString: SELECT o.month_name as monthName FROM period as o WHERE extract(YEAR FROM o.month_startdate) >= coalesce((SELECT extract(YEAR FROM a.var_datetime) FROM History_configuration as a WHERE a.var_name = 'firstSync'), extract(YEAR FROM cast('01/01/2019' as timestamp))) AND extract(YEAR FROM o.month_enddate) <= (SELECT extract(YEAR FROM b.var_datetime) FROM History_configuration as b WHERE b.var_name = 'lastHourAggr') AND extract(MONTH FROM o.month_startdate) >= coalesce((SELECT extract(MONTH FROM a.var_datetime) FROM History_configuration as a WHERE a.var_name = 'firstSync'),extract(MONTH FROM cast('01/01/2019' as timestamp))) AND extract(MONTH FROM o.month_enddate) <= (SELECT extract(MONTH FROM b.var_datetime) FROM History_configuration as b WHERE b.var_name = 'lastHourAggr')
